constraint.name: ca_liquidacionescomisiones_agentes
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (codagente) REFERENCES agentes (codagente) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_liquidacionescomisiones_empresas
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idempresa) REFERENCES empresas (idempresa) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_liquidacionescomisiones_facturas
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idfactura) REFERENCES facturasprov (idfactura) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_liquidacionescomisiones_series
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (codserie) REFERENCES series (codserie) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE
